notes.dns_protection: Use socks5:// prefix - the scripts will automatically convert to socks5h:// for DNS protection
recommended_providers: Bright Data (formerly Luminati) - Residential SOCKS5 proxies
free_alternatives: Note: Free SOCKS5 proxies are generally unreliable and rate-limited
Use HTTP proxies from working_proxies.json for free options
Consider mixing HTTP and SOCKS5 for better results
